properties.areaDesc: Jackson; Union; Alexander; Perry; Bollinger; Cape Girardeau
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 7 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
At 931 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along
a line extending from near Ava to near Altenburg to near
Millersville. Movement was southeast at 30 mph.

HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around
unsecured objects.

Locations impacted include...
Cape Girardeau, Jackson, Trail Of Tears State Park, Grand Tower,
Altenburg, Patton, Millersville, Ware, Daisy, Cedar Lake Area, Alto
Pass, Frohna, Oak Ridge, Gorham, Sedgewickville, Pocahontas,
Longtown, Old Appleton, and East Cape Girardeau.

This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 96 and 125.
properties.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

NWSheadline: STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN UNION...WESTERN JACKSON...NORTHWESTERN ALEXANDER...NORTHEASTERN BOLLINGER...EASTERN PERRY AND CAPE GIRARDEAU COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 PM CDT

title: Current watches, warnings, and advisories for Jackson (ILZ084) IL
